title: Cloud-Native Microservices Migration
description: Led the architecture and implementation of migrating a large-scale monolithic Java EE application to a cloud-native microservices architecture on AWS. Designed service boundaries, set up CI/CD pipelines, and established DevOps practices across a team of 12 developers.

title: IoT Data Platform
description: Designed and implemented a high-throughput IoT data ingestion and processing platform handling millions of sensor messages per day. Integrated MQTT brokers, stream processing, and a time-series database backend.

title: Enterprise DevOps Transformation
description: Consulted a large enterprise in adopting DevOps practices and modernizing their delivery pipeline. Introduced container-based deployments, automated testing gates, and SCRUM-based processes.

title: OSGi Desktop Application Modernization
description: Modernized a legacy OSGi-based desktop application used in industrial environments, introducing automated UI testing, refactoring the plugin architecture, and preparing the codebase for a cloud-connected future.

title: Kubernetes-Based SaaS Platform
description: Ongoing engagement architecting and evolving a multi-tenant SaaS platform running on Kubernetes. Responsibilities include Helm chart development, observability setup, and performance optimization.
